title: Blended Learning and Gamification-Based Projects to Strengthen Argumentative Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic writing skills, general understanding of social issues
context.additional_context: Focuses on pre-service teachers acquiring instructional methods for argumentative writing suitable for secondary learners and accumulating practical experience in a blended learning environment incorporating gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the core structure of argumentative writing (claim-evidence-counterargument) and construct logically organized texts.
Learners can engage in online discussions at a rate of over 80% by exchanging peer feedback using digital tools (smartphone-based platforms).
Learners can complete five or more argumentative writing outputs by receiving motivation through gamification elements (points, badges, leaderboards).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
